class.rdfs:comment: (editorial work in progress, this definition is incomplete and unreviewed) A MediaReview is a more specialized form of Review dedicated to the evaluation of media content online, typically in the context of fact-checking and misinformation. For more general reviews of media in the broader sense, use UserReview, CriticReview or other Review types.
class.rdfs:label: MediaReview

schema:mediaAuthenticityCategory.rdfs:comment: Indicates a MediaManipulationRatingEnumeration classification of a media object (in the context of how it was published or shared).
schema:mediaAuthenticityCategory.rdfs:label: mediaAuthenticityCategory
